title: Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2014 (v15.1.0) x86-x64 RUS-ENG Update 2 by
description:
Year of release : 2015
Version : 2014.1.1 (15.1.0.6981)
Developer : Adobe
By assembling : m0nkrus & PAINTER
Platform : Windows x86-x64
Compatible with Seven : full
Language : English + Russian
Medicine : Present System requirements:

- Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon 64
- Microsoft Windows 7 or Windows 8.x
- 2 GB of RAM
- 1 GB of free hard disk space for installation; additional free space required during installation (can not install on removable flash storage devices)
- Screen resolution of 1280 x 1024 with 16-bit video card
- Java Runtime Environment 1.6 (included)
- Internet connection required for registration and compulsory activation of the software, confirm your participation in the program and access to online services Description:

Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2014 - A new version of software for creating professional Web sites. Software for web design Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2014 includes an intuitive visual interface for creating and editing websites and mobile applications.
Use the "rubber modelsÃ‚Â» (Fluid Grid Layouts) with cross-platform support for the creation of pages. Browse layouts in the panel "multiscreen viewing" before publication. Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2014 is part of the Creative Cloud .
Therefore, its users have access to all the latest updates, and access to new versions available from the date of their issue. Improve your skills and master new tools thanks to the large and ever-growing collection of instructional videos.
Through integration with the Behance can share their projects with other users and receive instant feedback on their work from designers around the world.

What changed me:

- From the original ESD-distribution, containing Russian and English languages, removed all other language packs.
- 32-bit and 64-bit distributions are combined in a single installer.
- A number of the original files for patched installer replaced (cracked PAINTER ), so there was a possibility of combining distributions.
- The distribution integrated update for Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2014 32-bit to version 15.1.0.6981.
- The distribution integrated update for Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2014 64-bit to version 15.1.0.6981.
- The distribution is integrated utility Adobe Update Management Tool 8.0 (developed PAINTER ), which is able to set the "cloud" update.
- In the folder Crack in the image are a set of tools and detailed instructions to register the Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2014.
- By kutsemu installer ESD-version added a menu similar to the Box-version. Made it in the image of the same menu for Dreamweaver CS4.

Activation Instructions:

1. Start the installation of Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2014 (file autoplay.exe ), accept the license agreement and continue the installation nominally Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2014 until its completion.
NOTE: If you want to install Adobe Update Management Tool, included in this package, but you UMT currently already is present in the system (for example, an earlier version) before starting the installation, you must remove the existing version of this already. Otherwise, the deployment of the entire package at some point will be forced interrupted, and the installation is complete!
2. When installation is complete, run the patch adobe.snr.patch-painter.exe folder Crack , a drop-down menu, select "Try to patch another product with the amtlib file (32-Bit)" or "Try to patch another product with the amtlib file (64-Bit) "(located at the bottom of the list) and click Patch. In the window that says "Can not find the file. Search the file?" Click "Yes" (Yes). File Search window opens amtlib.dll . Specify that file to its patching.
By default, a 32-bit system, this file is the path: C:  Program Files  Adobe  Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2014.1  amtlib.dll
On a 64-bit system when you install the 32-bit version of the program, this file is the path: C:  Program Files (x86)  Adobe  Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2014.1  amtlib.dll
On a 64-bit system when you install the 64-bit version of the program, this file is the path: C:  Program Files  Adobe  Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2014.1  amtlib.dll
3. Enjoy the registered version of the product!
